description: Dashboard for Basic AWS MSK Kafka Cluster metrics visualisation

panels.description: Only one controller per cluster should be active at any given time.
panels.title: Active Controller

panels.description:
Connection status of broker's ZooKeeper session which may be one of the following: 

NOT_CONNECTED: '0.0', 

ASSOCIATING: '0.1', 

CONNECTING: '0.5', 

CONNECTEDREADONLY: '0.8', 

CONNECTED: '1.0', 

CLOSED: '5.0', 

AUTH_FAILED: '10.0'.
panels.title: ZooKeeper Session State

panels.description: The total number of leaders of partitions per broker, not including replicas.
panels.title: Leader Count

panels.description: The aggregated offset lag for all the partitions in a topic.
panels.title: Sum Offset Lag

panels.description: The mean latency in milliseconds for Apache ZooKeeper requests from broker.
panels.title: ZooKeeper Request Latency

panels.description: The percentage of disk space used for data logs.
panels.title: Kafka Data Logs Disk Used

panels.description: The percentage of disk space used for application logs.
panels.title: Kafka App Logs Disk Used

panels.description: The percentage of the root disk used by the broker.
panels.title: Root Disk Used

title: AWS MSK Kafka
